name: Dolphin TAS Movie
summary: Learn about .DTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can create DTM files in Dolphin by selecting Emulation â†’ Start Recording. The DTM file is created to store data such as the game ID, recording start time, controller input data, and other in-game settings.
You can use the Dolphin emulator to view the DTM file. You can also use DTM Editor (only for GameCube controller data) to edit the buttons, triggers, D-Pad , and stick positions for each frame.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
